dict.acceptation: 全体员工；（与复数动词连用）人员，员工；人事部门；

sent.orig: Talent Agencies include the talent agencies approved by the Ministry of Personnel and Beijing Personnel Bureau.
sent.trans: 人才中介服务机构包括人事部和北京市人事局批准的人才中介服务机构。

sent.orig: First, I not go anywhere in the hospital without McDonald's personnel as well as hospital personnel.
sent.trans: 第一，没有麦当劳公司以及医护人员的陪同，我不能到处走动。

sent.orig: Personnel Time Management is embedded in the basic functions of Personnel Administration.
sent.trans: 时间管理是嵌入在人员管理的基本功能。

sent.orig: The wages of personnel management system designed to meet the various personnel, wage management needs.
sent.trans: 本文所设计的人事工资管理系统可以满足各企业人事、工资管理方面的需要。

sent.orig: In Shanghai, do what is an interior design personnel, just graduated from the professional personnel salary.
sent.trans: 在上海做一个室内设计人员是多少，刚刚毕业的该专业的人员工资多少。
